string-array.name: scriptCreate
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE [TERREMOTOS] ([ID] INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,[TITULO] VARCHAR(150) NULL,[MAGNITUD] FLOAT NULL,[LATITUD] FLOAT NULL,[LONGITUD] FLOAT NULL,[FECHA] TIMESTAMP NULL,[LINK] VARCHAR(150) NULL)
